welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Smyrna, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to the needs of private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for chartered and private flights at College Park Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Fixed Base Operator Terminal
terminals.description: The Fixed Base Operator (FBO) terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves private and corporate flights, providing services such as fueling, maintenance, and hangar rentals.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cartersville Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
